metadata.dc:description: The Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis, is a rare disease and the aetiology is unknown. This disease is characterized by an intense inflammation and usually fibrosis of the intra and extrahepatic portion of the biliary tree.
metadata.dc:title: Colangitis esclerosante primaria.
[Primary sclerosing cholangitis].
